snippet.title: This War of Mine: Stories - Fading Embers | Official Teaser
snippet.description:
“The great use of life is to spend it for something that will outlast it” — William James

Get the Season Pass here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/750031/This_War_of_Mine_Stories__Season_Pass/

The expansion features story-driven scenario that tells a story of Anja living in a warzone and carrying a heavy burden as she has to answer to herself what is more important - survival of human legacy or the survival of a man.

Tomasz Kisilewicz, the lead artist behind Fading Embers, underlines non-linear approach to gameplay as well as the main theme: "This Story focuses on choices that lead to multiple endings that were necessary to cover the question of what has the bigger value: things made by men that outlast life or the life itself. When you think about it, humans stand against the destructive power of war not only to save themselves but also to save what entire generations create."

Fading Embers is going to be released on Steam, GOG, Humble Store and Mac Appstore on the 6th of August. The new DLC is a part of the Season Pass to This War of Mine: Stories available here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/750031/This_War_of_Mine_Stories__Season_Pass/

Visit 11 bit studios' channels:
Official website: http://www.11bitstudios.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/11bitstudios
This War of Mine's Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/thiswarofmine
Twitter: https://twitter.com/11bitstudios
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/11bitstudios

Video credits:
Editing: Dawid Kurowski
Scripting: Dawid Kurowski, Patryk Grzeszczuk, Rufus Kubica
